Classy web-development dressed in a DSL

Install!

gem install sinatra -y

Require! (any filename you wish)

# lyrics.rb
require 'rubygems'
require 'sinatra'
yup.. that's it for a sec

Run!

ruby lyrics.rb

Bask!

http://localhost:4567

Write! 

get '/' do
  "Now that's a fine looking dame!"
end
